divs: Sighting Details monday nov. 5th I was at my mothers house I wentoutside to smoke a cigarette .It was near sunset I sat down in a chair (arocking chair) and as I was leaning back I looked up and noticed a odd contrail.I looked at hard but it was pretty far up in the sky .I went inside and grabedmy binoculars and went back outside. (bushnell 7x50) the object itself had noapparent tail and no apparent wingsI belive it was silvery refective but Ilooked orange with the naked eye and with the binoculars( sunset?)it lookedcigar shaped. The two odd things1 it was completly silent 2 it had one shortsteady contrail and one contrail that was leaving a dotted line I watched it forabout two or less minutesI walked around the side and then the front of thehouse till it dissappered from my view wittness 2 was my mother ..she cameoutside when I grabbed my binoculars she was wondering what I was looking at .
Summary: tail less,wingless craft with a dotted line contra
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Stone Mountain
There was one other sighting in Stone Mountain on or around November 5th 2001
